parentOrganization.name: PostScan Mail, Inc.

areaServed.name: Greater Los Angeles Metropolitan Area Service Zone

serviceOutput.name: 24/7 Personal Mail Management
serviceOutput.description: Access your personal mailbox anytime, anywhere. View photos of mail and packages instantly, decide to open and scan contents, forward to any address, or securely shred unwanted mail - all from your smartphone or computer.

serviceOutput.name: Real Street Address for Personal Use
serviceOutput.description: Get a real U.S. street address (not a PO Box) for personal mail, online shopping, subscriptions, and services. Perfect for apartment dwellers, frequent movers, travelers, and privacy protection.

serviceOutput.name: Personal Package Receiving and Forwarding
serviceOutput.description: Receive packages from all carriers (USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL) at your virtual address. Forward to your current location worldwide, consolidate multiple packages to save shipping costs, or hold for pickup.

serviceOutput.name: Personal Document Scanning and Storage
serviceOutput.description: High-resolution scanning of important personal mail like tax documents, insurance papers, bank statements, and government notices. Secure cloud storage accessible from anywhere with instant email alerts.

serviceOutput.name: Privacy Protection Service
serviceOutput.description: Keep your home address private while receiving mail and packages. Perfect for online shopping, dating apps, freelance work, or any situation where you don't want to share your personal address.

serviceOutput.name: Travel and Remote Living Support
serviceOutput.description: Maintain a permanent U.S. address while traveling, living abroad, or moving frequently. Receive mail forwarding for important documents, subscriptions, and government correspondence wherever you are.

serviceOutput.name: Online Shopping Package Management
serviceOutput.description: Shop from any U.S. retailer and have purchases sent to your virtual address. Package consolidation, international shipping, and secure storage. Never miss a delivery or worry about package theft again.

serviceOutput.name: Personal Storage Solutions
serviceOutput.description: Secure storage for personal belongings, seasonal items, important documents, and packages. Flexible short-term or long-term storage with 7 days free, then $0.10 per pound per day.

serviceOutput.name: Subscription and Service Management
serviceOutput.description: Use your virtual address for magazine subscriptions, streaming services, financial accounts, and online services. Maintain continuity when moving or traveling without address change hassles.

serviceOutput.name: Important Mail Alert System
serviceOutput.description: Never miss critical personal mail. Instant notifications for tax documents, legal notices, insurance communications, and government mail. Review, forward, or archive with one click.

Perfect for apartment dwellers avoiding package theft, frequent movers maintaining address continuity, and privacy-conscious individuals.
